channel.title: Autumn Invitational - "Signups"
channel.description:
![turkeybanner (2)|690x270](upload://bsGRZK8wSznPeRkWYpRv2PhChNf.jpeg)
## Welcome to the Autumn Invitational! Hosted by @Chloe and @astand
### [color=tomato]Rules[/color] Follow the [Global Forum Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) as well as the [FM/FoL Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926) ### [color=tomato]Post Requirement[/color] This game has a post requirement of **20 substantive, on-topic, game related posts** per in game day. Posts that are explicitly or obviously made solely for the purpose of meeting this requirement do not count towards the minimum, nor do posts containing *solely* a vote. Failing to meet this requirement a single time will result in a force-replace without warning. Prods will be given at the hosts discretion if they consider it likely that you will not hit this minimum. This requirement may be reduced or waived if an execution is hammered early by majority. ### [color=tomato]Gameplay[/color] * Phases are 48/24, with the exception of Day 2, which will be extended by 24 hours. (To accomodate for American Thanksgiving) * The factional kill is **mandatory and assigned**, but may be done alongside other actions. If the member performing the factional kill is not specified, the last member to submit a kill will be assumed to be performing it. If no Mafia submit a kill, a player will be picked at random from the living non-Mafia players, and a random Mafia member will perform the action. * The Mafia will have access to a 24/7 chat and may communicate at any time. * Both majority and plurality are in effect. All votes must be in the form `**/vote [name of player]**` to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form `**/unvote**`. This is to enable the smooth processing of votes. * You may self-vote. Along with this, no-elimination is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-elim and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-elim will have priority in the rand. * Tied votes will result in a player being eliminated at random from among the tied players. * Votes are locked in LyLo, but not MyLo. * Roleblock feedback will only be given to *investigative* roles - when they would normally receive results. (Voyeur, Motion Detector, Role Cop, Tracker, Watcher, Parity Cop) * Action resolution system prioritizes scum PRs in instances of direct conflict. * If two players of the same alignment roleblock eachother, the actions cancel, and neither player will be seen as visiting by a Watcher or Tracker. * Flavor is not alignment-indicative. ### [color=Tomato]Setup[/color] The uninformed majority are the [color=green]**Town**[/color] and the informed minority are the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] [details=Setup Information (D6 Mafia)] **Town Power Roles:** To determine the town power roles, roll a die six times and mark down the numbers. Each roll corresponds to a grouping below. **1-3:** Investigative **4-5:** Protective **6:** Killing Mark down the number of each grouping and add the corresponding roles from the table below. ![image|690x229](upload://rwA3YIAY6BZAE0w5JQYM03yCJBU.png) Add as many Vanilla Town roles as necessary to bring the total number of Town roles to 10. **Mafia Power Roles:** Count the number of town power roles from above, then take that number minus one. Roll a die that many times and mark down the numbers. Add the corresponding roles from the table below. ![image|212x268](upload://iHndzSSEk2eDISqs8dqrhAvzdtq.png) Add as many Mafia Goon roles as necessary to bring the total number of Mafia roles to 3. [/details] [details=Town Class Cards] > # [color=green]Vanilla Town[/color] >You are a Vanilla Town. Your only weapons are your voice and your vote. > > *Defeat the Mafia* [details=Investigative Classes] > # [color=green]Town Innocent Child[/color] > You are a Town Innocent Child. At any point during the day, you may choose to reveal your alignment publicly. This may only be done once. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Voyeur[/color] > You are a Town Voyeur. Each night, you may select a player. You will be told what action types, if any, they were targeted by. > > **Action Types:** > **Killing** - Mafia Factional Kill, Town Vigilante Shot > **Protective** - Bodyguard, Doctor, Jailkeeper, Roleblocker > **Investigative** - Role Cop, Tracker, Watcher > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Motion Detector[/color] > You are a Town Motion Detector. Each night, you may select a player. You will learn whether or not this player used or was targeted by an action. You will not be told which happened. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Role Cop[/color] > You are a Town Role Cop. Each night, select a player. You will learn the player's role, but not their alignment. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Tracker[/color] > You are a Town Tracker. Each night, select a player. You will determine who this target visits. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Parity Cop[/color] > You are a Town Parity Cop. Each night, select a player. You will learn whether or not the player's alignment matches the last person you selected. You will not receive a result for your first check. > >*Defeat the Mafia* [/details] [details=Protective Classes] > # [color=green]Town Bodyguard[/color] > You are a Town Bodyguard. Each night, select a player. If this player were to die tonight, you will die instead. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Doctor[/color] > You are a Town Doctor. Each night, select a player. Target player will be protected from death for the night. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Roleblocker[/color] > You are a Town Roleblocker. Each night, select a player. Target player will be prevented from performing any actions for the night. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town Jailkeeper[/color] > You are a Town Jailkeeper. Each night, select a player. Target player will be protected from death, as well as prevented from performing any actions for the night. > >*Defeat the Mafia* [/details] [details=Killing Classes] > # [color=green]Town 1-Shot Vigilante[/color] > You are a Town 1-Shot Vigilante. Once per game, you may target a player, killing them. > >*Defeat the Mafia* > # [color=green]Town 2-Shot Vigilante[/color] > You are a Town 2-Shot Vigilante. Twice per game, you may target a player, killing them. > >*Defeat the Mafia* ># [color=green]Town Vigilante[/color] > You are a Town Vigilante. Each night you may target a player, killing them. > >*Defeat the Mafia* [/details] [/details] [details=Mafia Class Cards] > # [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] > You are a Mafia Goon. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. > > *Reach parity with the Town* ># [color=red]Mafia Role Cop[/color] > You are a Mafia Role Cop. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. > >Each night, select a player. You will learn the player's role. > >*Reach parity with the Town* > # [color=red]Mafia Tracker[/color] > You are a Mafia Tracker. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. > >Each night, select a player. You will determine who this target visits. > >*Reach parity with the Town* > # [color=red]Mafia Watcher[/color] > You are a Mafia Watcher. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. > >Each night, select a player. You will determine who visited this target. > >*Reach parity with the Town* > # [color=red]Mafia Roleblocker[/color] > You are a Mafia Roleblocker. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. > >Each night, select a player. Target player will be prevented from performing any actions for the night. > >*Reach parity with the Town* > # [color=red]Mafia Jailkeeper[/color] > You are a Mafia Jailkeeper. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. > >Each night, select a player. Target player will be protected from death, as well as prevented from performing any actions for the night. > >*Reach parity with the Town* [/details] [details=Investigative Feedback] **Voyeur** "Your target was targeted by the following action types:" "Your target was not targeted by any other actions." **Motion Detector** “Your target used an action or an action was used on them last night!” “Your target did not use an action and no actions were used on them!” **Role Cop** “Your target is a [x]!” x being "Vanilla Town or Mafia Goon," or the name of a role - no alignment included. **Tracker** “Your target visited [player name] last night!” “Your target visited no one last night!” **Parity Cop** “Your target is (not) the same alignment as your previous target!” **Watcher** "Your target was visited by [x]!" "Nobody visited your target." [/details] ### [color=tomato]Player List[/color] 1. Vulgard 2. Arete 3. DatBird 4. Geyde 5. Marshal 6. Icibalus 7. Hippo 8. Centuries 9. Orange 10. Solic 11. Sulit 12. Mistyx 13. katze ### [color=tomato]Backups[/color] 1. SirDerpsALot 2. 3. ### [color=tomato]Spectators[/color] **Uninformed** 1. Jane 2. thepigeonnyc 3. clonedcheese 4. Napoleon **Informed** 1. ATNoName 2. Trochilidae 3. min 4. EliThePsycho 5. Silviu 6. Whysper ## The game will begin [date=2020-11-21 time=10:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"]
